EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Data_Workshop_Roadshow_2015.Confirm - Minneapolis
EmailTemplate.subject: You are Confirmed - Big Data Roadshow Minneapolis
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Tuesday, September 22, 2015 Hilton Minneapolis Bloomington 3900 American Boulevard West Bloomington, MN 55437 {{my.Save the Date - Minneapolis:default=edit me}} Thank you for registering for the upcoming Big Data Roadshow <http://www.pivotal.io/big-data/data-roadshow/minneapolis?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=data-roadshow> in Minneapolis.
To fully participate in the hands-on workshop, please bring your laptop with wireless connectivity enabled.
Questions? Please contact us via email <mailto:pivotal-operations@pivotal.io> or visit our website <http://www.pivotal.io?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=data-roadshow>. AGENDA
8:00 AM - 9:00 AM Check-In & Breakfast
9:00 AM - 10:15 AM The Journey to Becoming a Data-Driven Enterprise
10:15 AM - 10:30 AM Coffee Break
10:30 AM - 12:00 PM Internet of Things Demo and Architecture Overview
12:00 PM - 1:00 PM Lunch & Birds of a Feather Discussion
1:00 PM - 3:00 PM Hands-On Technical Workshop VIEW FULL AGENDA <http://www.pivotal.io/big-data/data-roadshow/minneapolis?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=data-roadshow>
